// eslint-disable-next-line import/prefer-default-export
export function isAuthenticated(cookie){var parsed="; ".concat(cookie).split('; userLoggedIn=');if(parsed.length===2){return parsed.pop().split(';').shift()==='true';}return false;}export function getCurrentUserId(cookie){if(!isAuthenticated(cookie)){return null;}var name='current_user';var userId=null;if(cookie&&cookie!==''){var cookies=cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<cookies.length;i++){var parsedCookie=cookies[i].trim();if(parsedCookie.substring(0,name.length+1)==="".concat(name,"=")){userId=parseUserId(decodeURIComponent(parsedCookie.substring(name.length+1)));break;}}}return userId;}function parseUserId(decodedUserData){var userData=JSON.parse(decodedUserData);return userData.id;}
